text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Common carrier" means a business entity that:
Holds itself out as being available to the public to transport in interstate or foreign commerce for compensation any class of passenger or property; and
Holds a common carrier permit issued under § 2-101(y) of this article.
"Common carrier" does not include a business entity that transports only property it owns or that is consigned to it.

text.section: "Direct wine shipper" means the holder of a direct wine shipper's permit issued under this title.
"Pomace brandy" means brandy that is distilled from the pulpy residue of the wine press, including the skins, pips, and stalks of grapes.

section.section: "Wine" does not include beer, distilled spirits, or any alcoholic beverage other than wine.
